text: "Rainin'" is a song by American rock band Sponge. It was released in 1995 as the fourth single from their debut album Rotting Piñata. ==Release and reception== It is the band's fourth highest-charting song on the Modern Rock Tracks chart, where it reached number 34. The song also reached number 18 on the Mainstream Rock Tracks chart. ==Music video== The music video for "Rainin'" was released in 1995 and was directed by Doug Aitken. ==Track listing== ==Charts== {| class="wikitable" !Chart (1995) !Peak position |- |US Billboard Modern Rock Tracks | align="center"| 34 |- |US Billboard Mainstream Rock Tracks | align="center"| 18 |} ==Personnel== * Vinnie Dombroski – lead vocals * Joey Mazzola – guitar, backing vocals * Mike Cross – guitar * Tim Cross – bass * Jimmy Paluzzi – drums ==References== Category:1995 songs Category:Sponge (band) songs
title: Rainin'
